analysis.key_quote: I believe the reclassification of the career civil service employees will undermine the long record of a professional and honest civil service that is one of the underpinnings of a American democracy and effectiveness.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the politicization of civil service and its negative impact on public trust and scientific integrity, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and due process.
